title: Nomophobia (no-mobile-phone phobia) among the undergraduate medical students
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Suleman Lazarus, Abdul Rahim Ghafari, Richard Kapend, Khalid Jan Rezayee, Hasibullah Aminpoor, Mohammad Yasir Essar, Arash Nemat
